org.grobid.core.annotations
Class TeiStAXParsedInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.grobid.core.annotations.TeiStAXParsedInfo

public class TeiStAXParsedInfo
extends Object

Class containing all the informations about the parsed publication of TEI document.

Author:
Damien

Constructor Detail

TeiStAXParsedInfo

public TeiStAXParsedInfo(boolean pIndent)
Constructor.

Parameters:
pIndent - If the description has to be indented.
Method Detail

reset

public void reset()
Method to reset the current object when the parsing of a publication is done. Has to be called before continuing to parse the full document.

resetDescription

public void resetDescription()
Reset the description to process a new one.

appendTagName

public void appendTagName(String pTagName)
Adds the tag pTagName to the tags List.

Parameters:
pTagName - The tag name to add.

removeTagName

public void removeTagName(String pTagName)
Removes the tag pTagName to the tags List.

Parameters:
pTagName - The tag name to remove.

checkIfDescription

public boolean checkIfDescription(StartElement pDescriptionTag)
Checks if the tag pTagName with attributes pAttributtes is a description. If it is a description, the object description is initiated.

Parameters:
pTagName - The tag name.
pAttributtes - The attributes of the tage name.
Returns:
true if the current tag is a description, false else.

processParagraphStartTag

public boolean processParagraphStartTag(StartElement pStart)
When the parser is in a description, this method is called to process the start of a paragraph. If the StartElement is not a paragraph, nothing is processed.

Parameters:
pStart - the StartElement to process.
Returns:
true if the StartElement was a paragraph.

processParagraphEndTag

public boolean processParagraphEndTag(String pTagName)
When the parser is inside a paragraph (See #processParagraphStartTag(String, Iterator), this method is called to notify that the parser is finishing to parse a paragraph or not.

Parameters:
pTagName - The name of the tag.
Returns:
true if the ending tag is a paragraph, false else.

appendDescriptionContent

public void appendDescriptionContent(String pContent)
When inside a paragraph (See #processParagraphStartTag(String, Iterator)), this method is called to add some content to the description.

Parameters:
pContent - The content to add.

getCurrentGornIndex

public String getCurrentGornIndex()
Returns:
The current gorn index.

incrementGornIndex

public void incrementGornIndex()
Increment the gorn index.

decrementGornIndex

public void decrementGornIndex()
Decrement the gorn index.

getDescription

public Description getDescription()
Returns:
The description

isAttrTypeDescription

protected static boolean isAttrTypeDescription(StartElement pStartTag)
Check if the StartElement has an attribute of the type type="description".

Parameters:
pStartTag - the StartElement.
Returns:
true if it is a description, false else.
